channel.title: 多线程 - Tag - 数语轩

item.title: C# Winform 跨线程更新UI控件常用方法汇总
item.author: fancybit
item.description: <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px">线程安全</span></strong> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px">支持异步</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;font-size: 14px">/</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px">同步</span></strong> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <strong><span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px">其他</span></strong> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 12px">是</span> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;font-size: 12px">Post/Send</span> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <span style="font-size: 12px"><span style="font-family: 宋体">尽量在窗体构造函数、</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif">FormLoad</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">中获取同步上下文</span></span> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <span style="font-family: 宋体;font-size: 12px">是</span> </td> <td style="border-color: rgb(192, 192, 192);border-collapse: collapse;padding: 8px 14px"> <span style="font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;font-size: 12px">control.
